Privacy-First AI Technology

Unlike other messaging platforms that send your data to cloud servers for AI processing, CipherChat's AI features run entirely on your device. Your messages never leave your control, ensuring complete privacy while still providing intelligent assistance.

Our unique approach combines the power of on-device machine learning with our military-grade encryption, creating an experience that's both smart and secure.
